name: VoiceSpace
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Your host is a former interactive creative director and present founder of Buzzz, a “Reddit for Voice" social startup. 

This flash briefing-style podcast is a stream-of-consciousness, semi-philosophical journey into the applications and implications of voice-first interaction. 

Ready to go into Voice Space.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
